function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Protocols for managing confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Managing confirmed covid-19 cases","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish standardized accuracy measures specific to covid-19 detection and adoption for evaluating the performance of wearable technology","category":"Standardized accuracy measures for covid-19 detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and testing of wastewater samples for sars-cov-2 can provide early detection and enable prompt control measures to prevent further spread.","category":"Early detection in wastewater samples","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development and implementation of standardized protocols and assays for sars-cov-2 detection in environmental samples can ensure consistency and comparability of data.","category":"Standardized protocols for sars-cov-2 detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improvement of assay sensitivity through the development and implementation of more sensitive and specific assays for sars-cov-2 detection in sewage samples.","category":"Sensitivity improvement for sars-cov-2 sanitation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-validate the performance of different rt-qpcr assays on wastewater samples and ensure sequencing of positive samples for
